task.summary: Default task
Non-gradle version of Phase 2 complete
Min SDK now 14
Reset google play services module
Set up framework support
Fixed bug with initial dialog not displaying when game is won
Refactored RestaurantQuiz
Further refactoring of RestaurantQuiz Added TODO for potential Phase 2 tasks
Improved layout at bottom of window - textviews now span two lines
Removed redundant links to libraries.
Integrated Google Play Services module
Added Google Play Services lib to svn ignore
Updated after removing play services lib from version control
Refactoring of names in RestaurantQuiz. Moved arrow.png resource.
Factored out marker management into MarkerManager class
Added documentation to MarkerManager
Recent scores persisted and menu option added to display them (needs more work - custom view for scores needed)
Polished recent scores view.
Fixed bug serializing scores
Standardized text size in scores list
Added documentation
Added custom background color for high scores list.
Deleted PolylineDecoder - using the one provided in maps-util library instead.
Stripped out code that students must add as part of Phase 2. Added TODOs.
Updated documentation - distance truncated rather than rounded off to nearest integer
Update to DownloadRestaurantsFromYelpTask - toast now displays if operation failed.
Updated documentation on ScoreTracker.addScore
Updated documentation on ScoreTracker.addScore
